General.Name: Lixiang Education Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Lixiang Education Holding Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides private education services to high school education and vocational education in the People's Republic of China. It also offers food procurement services. The company was formerly known as Lianwai Education Group Limited and changed its name to Lixiang Education Holding Co., Ltd. in May 2020. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Lishui, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 818 Hua Yuan Street, Lishui, China, 323000

5.Name: Mr. Chen  Guoliang
5.Title: Principal of Lianwai School & Exec. Director
